metadata.title: CVE-2015-20107 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Python (aka CPython) up to 3.10.8, the mailcap module does not addescape characters into commands discovered in the system mailcap file. Thismay allow attackers to inject shell commands into applications that callmailcap.findmatch with untrusted input (if they lack validation ofuser-provided filenames or arguments). The fix is also back-ported to 3.7,3.8, 3.9

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
